summary:
Internationally experienced HSSE professional, with work experience / qualifications in Oil & gas, renewable, fabrication / construction yards, marine, shipbuilding / repair. 
Familiar with working in diverse locations and cultures worldwide.  Supervisor of multinational HSE professionals. Practical experience in the effective development and delivery of Project and company HSE Systems and Procedures.

Skills summary:
ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 450001, Internal / External Audits, Root Cause Incident Investigation, Emergency Response, Risk Assessment, HAZID, SIMOPS, Behavioural Audits, Training, Bidding / Commercial, Trends Analyse, food safety (HACCP), HSE Budgets.

Significant Career Accomplishments:
•1.000.000 Man Hour LTI Free on Bul Hanine Project, Qatar 
•1.000.000 Man Hour LTI Free on IMR Project, Azerbaijan
•Coordinate HSE part of an 1.8 billion $ contract (Shah Deniz Stage 2 in Azerbaijan)
•886 days without Lost Time Injuries during the ACG Full Field Development in Azerbaijan.
•Implementation of an HSE Proactive Inputs target systems.
